con:request.name: UseToken - Sale (New Id)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" > <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:UseToken> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:Amount>${Amount}</acr1:Amount> <acr1:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr1:CardVerificationNumber> <acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode> <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber> <acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:SecureCode xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:TokenId>${UseToken}</acr1:TokenId> <acr1:TransactionType>Sale</acr1:TransactionType> </tem:request> </tem:UseToken> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
